name: Children with Disabilities (IDEA) Discipline for State Level
dataViewDescription: This data view captures the count of children ages 3 through 21 who were subject to disciplinary removals, including suspensions, expulsions, placements in interim alternative educational settings, and removals due to violations such as drug or weapon offenses, serious bodily injury, and violations of the Gun-Free Schools Act (GFSA).

files.name: FS005 - Children with Disabilities (IDEA) Removal to Interim Alternative Educational Setting
files.description: The number of children with disabilities (IDEA) who are ages 3 through 21 as of the child count date and removed to an interim alternative educational setting either unilaterally by school personnel (not the IEP team) or by a hearing officer.

database.query: select * from RDS.ReportEDFactsK12StudentDisciplines where ReportCode = 'c005' and ReportLevel = 'sea' and ReportYear = ${reportingYear}

files.name: FS006 - Children with Disabilities (IDEA) Suspensions/Expulsions
files.description: The number of children with disabilities (IDEA) who are ages 3 through 21 and suspended or expelled for disciplinary reasons.

database.query: select * from RDS.ReportEDFactsK12StudentDisciplines where ReportCode = 'c006' and ReportLevel = 'sea' and ReportYear = ${reportingYear}

report_levels.sea: LEA CHILDREN WITH DISAB (IDEA) MULTI SUSPEN EXPU
report_levels.lea: SEA CHILDREN WITH DISAB (IDEA) MULTI SUSPEN EXPU

files.name: FS007 - Children with Disabilities (IDEA) Reasons for Unilateral Removal
files.description: The number of times children with disabilities (IDEA) who were ages 3 through 21 and unilaterally removed by school personnel (not the IEP team) from their current educational placement to an interim alternative educational setting (determined by the IEP team) due to drug or weapon offenses or serious bodily injury.

database.query: select * from RDS.ReportEDFactsK12StudentDisciplines where ReportCode = 'c007' and ReportLevel = 'sea' and ReportYear = ${reportingYear}

files.name: FS088 - Children with Disabilities (IDEA) Disciplinary Removals
files.description: Unduplicated counts of children with disabilities (IDEA), ages 3 through 21, who were subject to disciplinary removals during the school year. Includes removals of 1 day or less, 2 through 10 days, and greater than 10 days.

database.query: select * from RDS.ReportEDFactsK12StudentDisciplines where ReportCode = 'c088' and ReportLevel = 'sea' and ReportYear = ${reportingYear}

report_levels.sea: SEA CHILDREN WITH DISABILITIES (IDEA) DISCIP ACT
report_levels.lea: LEA CHILDREN WITH DISABILITIES (IDEA) DISCIP ACT

files.name: FS143 - Children with Disabilities (IDEA) Total Disciplinary Removals
files.description: The number of times children with disabilities (IDEA), ages 3 through 21, were subject to any kind of disciplinary removal, including expulsions.

database.query: select * from RDS.ReportEDFactsK12StudentDisciplines where ReportCode = 'c143' and ReportLevel = 'sea' and ReportYear = ${reportingYear}

report_levels.sea: SEA CHILDREN WITH DISAB (IDEA) TOTAL DISC REMOVAL
report_levels.lea: LEA CHILDREN WITH DISAB (IDEA) TOTAL DISC REMOVAL

files.name: FS144 - Educational Services During Expulsion
files.description: The unduplicated number of children (students) who were removed for disciplinary reasons from their regular school program for the remainder of the school year or longer, including all removals resulting from violations of the Gun-Free Schools Act (GFSA) of 1994.

database.query: select * from RDS.ReportEDFactsK12StudentDisciplines where ReportCode = 'c144' and ReportLevel = 'sea' and ReportYear = ${reportingYear}
